cause.description:
Strides for Change, MADD’s signature walk, is a fun, community-driven 5K walk that raises funds and saves lives. Every step taken and pledge made will help raise funds and awareness for MADD’s programs and services that will serve to make our communities safer.
This year Colorado's Strides for Change is on Saturday, August 4th. It starts at 9 am at Sloan's Lake Park (17th Ave, 2 blocks East of Sheridan Blvd). You can help by walking, volunteering, or donating. Here is the website for more information: http://support.madd.org
1. Every minute a person will suffer an injury from a drunk driving crash.
2. Alcohol kills more young people than all other illicit drugs combined.
3. MADD works in more than 600 communities across the country, and has more than 1,400 trained victim advocates on call 24 hours a day, seven days a week to support victims with comfort or legal assistance they can rely on.
cause.mission: stop drunk driving, support the victims of this violent crime, and prevent underage drinking.
